hhiSource: Calculated from ACRIS ownership records and PLUTO building data
cr4Source: Top 4 landlords by unit count / total NYC rental units (~2.2M)
notes: Citywide HHI is low because the market is fragmented across ~30,000 landlords. However, at the neighborhood level, concentration is dramatically higher â€” e.g., Stuyvesant Town/Peter Cooper Village (Blackstone) represents near-monopoly ownership in that micro-market. Institutional/PE ownership has grown from ~2% to ~8% of total units since 2015.
